links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,382
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 8000); x=contfrac(suminf(n=0, 1/3^(3^n))); for (n=0, 382, write("b061678.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 26 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 23 2001
